I downloaded the torrent, its great and all, but I can't get them to work. I didn't have a "downloads" folder in my EAGames directory, so I made one and  extracted the addons to that directory, but it does nothing. Any ideas??

In Sims 2 they have moved the directory under MY DOCUMENTS/EA GAMES

So you install your downloads there now. There is also a Sims 2 add-on installer that you can get to do it for you. Look for it at http://www.modthesims2.com/

Till er som inte kan lägga in grejorna/sakerna:
C:/Dokument/EAGames/Sims2/Downloads/ där ska du lägga alla sakerna i .. sen fungerar det till 110% (Givetvis packar du upp dem om de är packade i .ZIP) Finns inte C:/Dokument/EAGames/Sims2/"Downloads" skapar du bara en mapp där som heter " Downloads " sen är det bara till att överföra filerna.
